item.title: Iran’s parliament backs blocking Strait of Hormuz. Its closure would alienate Tehran further
item.description: The decision to close the waterway now rests with the country's national security council.

item.title: U.S. isn't at war with Iran, 'we're at war with Iran's nuclear program,' Vance says

item.title: How the Israel-Iran standoff took a turn and what's next after a pivotal 24 hours
